messages.title: IT'S A CONSERVATIVE MAJORITY OR A HUNG PARLIAMENT
messages.content: At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority â€“ or a hung parliament.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. With five long years of gridlock and uncertainty. SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence.

quotes.text: Polly teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority
The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. With five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.
Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance
Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. And they're demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain.

images.caption: DON'T RISK FIVE LONG YEARS OF CORBYN IN CHARGE

leaflet.additionalNotes: Presented by Alan Mabbutt on behalf of the Conservative and Unionist Party, both of 4 Matthew Parker Street, London.
